    <metadata>

      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lom.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>

            <catalog>CUP</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_a1b16ef18c3d84753be95b020b28e918b526901d</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Radiation from hot objects</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strahlung von den heißen Nachrichten</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Rayonnement des objets chauds</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Radiação dos objetos quentes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Radiazione dagli oggetti caldi</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ακτινοβολία από τα καυτά αντικείμενα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Radiación de objetos calientes</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">These illustrations show a hot mug (left) and a hot filament (right) as examples of objects emitting radiation at different wavelengths.</string>
          </description>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot filament</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">hot mugs</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">infra-red radiation</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Abbildungen zeigen einen heißen Becher 
(nach links) und einen heißen Heizfaden (recht) als Beispiele der 
Nachrichten, die Strahlung an den unterschiedlichen Wellenlängen 
ausstrahlen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ces illustrations montrent une attaque à main armée chaude
(à gauche) et un filament chaud (droit) comme exemples des objets 
émettant le rayonnement à différentes longueurs d'onde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estas ilustrações mostram uma caneca quente (à
esquerda) e um filamento quente (direito) como exemplos dos objetos 
que emitem-se a radiação em wavelengths diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Queste illustrazioni mostrano una tazza calda (a 
sinistra) e un filamento caldo (di destra) come esempi degli oggetti 
che emettono la radiazione alle lunghezze d'onda differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτές οι απεικονίσεις εμφανίζουν μια καυτή κούπα 
(αριστερά) και καυτή ίνα (δεξιά) ως παραδείγματα των 
αντικειμένων που εκπέμπουν την ακτινοβολία στα διαφορετικά μήκη 
κύματος.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Estas ilustraciones muestran una taza caliente (a
la izquierda) y un filamento caliente (derecho) como ejemplos de los 
objetos que emiten la radiación en diversas longitudes de onda.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heißer Heizfaden</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">heiße Becher</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Infrarotstrahlung</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wellenlängen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">filament chaud</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">attaques à main armée chaudes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">rayonnement infrarouge</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">longueurs d'onde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">filamento quente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canecas quentes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">radiação infravermelha</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">wavelengths</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">filamento caldo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">tazze calde</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">radiazione infrarossa</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lunghezze d'onda</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καυτή ίνα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">καυτές κούπες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">υπέρυθρη ακτινοβολία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μήκη κύματος</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">filamento caliente</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">tazas calientes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">radiación infrarroja</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">longitudes de onda</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
